entries.name: singleton
entries.desc: Is this an alias declared in a singleton context?

entries.name: new(text, old_name, new_name, comment, singleton = false)
entries.desc: Creates a new Alias with a token stream of text that aliases old_name to new_name, has comment and is a singleton context.

entries.name: aref()
entries.desc: HTML fragment reference for this alias

entries.name: name_prefix()
entries.desc: '::' for the alias of a singleton method/attribute, '#' for instance-level.
